name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is the latest flagship smartphone from Samsung, featuring a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 888 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 128GB of storage.

name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 is the latest smartphone from Apple, featuring a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, an A15 Bionic chip, 4GB of RAM, and up to 256GB of storage.

features.display: 6.1 inches, 1170 x 2532 pixels, Super Retina XDR

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is a high-end smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 888 processor, 12GB of RAM, and 256GB of storage.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: The Sony Xperia 1 III is a premium smartphone featuring a 6.5-inch 4K HDR OLED display, a Snapdragon 888 processor, 12GB of RAM, and up to 512GB of storage.
